Downloads

Get the latest beta releases of Xcode, iOS, macOS, watchOS, tvOS, and more.

Your use of Apple beta software is subject to and licensed only under the terms and conditions of the Apple Developer Program License Agreement, including any applicable consent to collect diagnostic data set forth therein. If you have not agreed to the Apple Developer Program License Agreement, you are not permitted to use this software. Refer to the software installation guides for complete instructions.

Featured Downloads
  •  
  • Build
  • Date
  •  

  • Xcode 8.1 beta

    Includes the SDKs for iOS 10.1 beta, macOS 10.12.1 beta, watchOS 3.1 beta, and tvOS 10.0.1 beta.
    Xcode 8.1 beta requires OS X 10.11.5 or later.

    • Release Notes
    • 8T29o
    • Sep 21, 2016

  • macOS 10.12.1 beta

    Run the Sierra Developer Beta Access Utility to download the latest macOS Sierra beta.

    • Release Notes
    • 16B2327e
    • Sep 21, 2016

  • iOS 10.1 betaPreferred

    Install Configuration Profile directly on any iOS device and receive OTA updates.

    • Release Notes
    • 14B55c
    • Sep 21, 2016

  • tvOS 10.0.1 betaPreferred

    For Apple TV (4th generation). Apple TV (3rd generation) and earlier are not supported.
    Install configuration profile directly on your device to receive OTA updates.

    • Release Notes
    • 14U54
    • Sep 21, 2016

  • tvOS Restore Image

    Install via iTunes.

  • Parallax Exporter

    Use the Parallax Exporter plug-in to preview a layered image while working in Adobe Photoshop.

    • Parallax Exporter for Mac

    • Parallax Exporter for Windows

  • Parallax Previewer

    Use Parallax Previewer to preview layered Photoshop files, assemble individual image layers from PNG files and preview the parallax effect, or preview layered images exported by the Parallax Exporter plug-in.

    • 1A68
    • Jan 25, 2016
